payload.message: No medium/high security issues found by Bandit.
payload.rule_family_basis: Security gate for this repo is: no Bandit findings with severity in {MEDIUM,HIGH} and confidence in {MEDIUM,HIGH}. If the gate passes, each enabled security rule family is recorded as 'pass (no medium/high findings)'.

rule_family_results.examples: eval, exec, compile, pickle.loads, os.system, os.popen
subprocess usage with shell=True or unsafe command construction
hardcoded passwords, tokens, API keys, basic auth strings
weak hashes (md5/sha1), insecure randomness, weak SSL/TLS settings
string concatenation / formatting used to build SQL
unsafe XML parsing patterns, unsafe yaml.load usage
tempfile.mktemp, predictable temp filenames, race-prone patterns
disabled certificate validation, weak TLS settings
debug flags enabled, risky asserts for security checks, leaking secrets
overly permissive chmod, unsafe file writes, world-writable paths
deprecated security APIs and other high-risk constructs
